disclaimers.content: *Does not include The Patriot (2000) for obvious reasons. Independence Day and Red Dawn count, but not the re-makes. Each viewing of either Rocky IV, Iron Eagle, or Top Gun will result in a $5 credit to your account which will be applied to your subsequent bill.
**Ralph can’t come on Tuesday nights. Bowling league.
†Badminton match must be within a 45 mile radius of Ogden, UT.
